name: BoatEntityHelper
description: Represents a boat entity in the Minecraft world, providing access to boat-specific properties and states. BoatEntityHelper allows you to identify boat types, check water/land status, and determine if a boat has chest storage capabilities.
overview: This class extends `EntityHelper` and inherits all methods for position, movement, passengers, and general entity properties. BoatEntityHelper instances are typically obtained through entity events, world queries, or when accessing vehicles that players or entities are riding.

methods.name: isChestBoat
methods.description: Determines if the boat has chest storage capabilities.

methods.name: getBoatBlockType
methods.description: Returns a `BlockHelper` representing the wood material type of the boat.

methods.name: getBoatType
methods.description: Returns the type of the boat (e.g., 'oak', 'spruce', 'birch').

methods.name: isInWater
methods.description: Checks if the boat is currently in water.

methods.name: isOnLand
methods.description: Checks if the boat is currently on land.

methods.name: isUnderwater
methods.description: Checks if the boat is currently fully submerged underwater.

methods.name: isInAir
methods.description: Checks if the boat is currently in the air (e.g., jumping or falling).
